name: F.P.S - Frootz per second
description:
F.P.S - Frootz per Second

________________

A "Hardcore FPS Clicker Game" full of kittens and sugary cereal!

________________

Ludum Dare #41

This Game is a Ludum Dare #41 submission, themed "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres"

_________________

Reviews

"A lifetime experience" - Cat Lady
"Is over 9.000!" - Copyrighted Character
